word_mean: 渗透，透入：穿过或通过，如通过滤器
透过物：溶液通过滤器的成分

sentence.Network_en: Eventually, the water will permeate through the surrounding concrete.
sentence.Network_cn: 最终，水会渗透进周围的混凝土中。

sentence.Network_en: Water will easily permeate a cotton dress.
sentence.Network_cn: 水很容易渗透棉布衣服.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... perforate 打洞 permeate 渗透 perfidy 不忠，背叛.
博士入学考试词汇 - 博士 ... permanent 固定不变,永久的 permeate 弥漫,充满,渗透 permit 允许,许可.
铄字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 削弱〖 weaken〗 渗入〖 permeate〗 明亮,光明〖 bright〗.
博士入学考试词汇 - 博士 ... permanent 固定不变,永久的 permeate 弥漫,充满,渗透 permit 允许,许可.

list.abs: helium nucleus 氦核helium permeation 氦渗透helium permeation test 氦渗透试验
permeant 浸透的permeate through 渗透入permeate 弥漫
layer between two phases because of its semi-permeable properties(半渗透性)...The key ability to control theproperty is the permeation rate(渗透速率)of.
permeation 渗透permeation pressure 渗透压permeation rate 渗透速率

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin permeat- 'passed through', from the verb permeare, from per- 'through' + meare 'pass, go'

entry.tran: （思想、感情、态度）感染，传播，扩散，影响
entry.def: If an idea, feeling, or attitude permeates a system or permeates society, it affects every part of it or is present throughout it.

example.ex: Bias against women permeates every level of the judicial system...
example.tran: 司法体制中各个层面都有歧视女性的现象。

example.ex: An obvious change of attitude at the top will permeate through the system.
example.tran: 上级态度的明显改变将影响到整个体制。

entry.def: If something permeates a place, it spreads throughout it.

example.ex: The smell of roast beef permeated the air...
example.tran: 空气中弥漫着烤牛肉的香味。

example.ex: Eventually, the water will permeate through the surrounding concrete.
example.tran: 最终,水会渗透进周围的混凝土中。

sentences.sentence: "An atmosphere of distrust has permeated this administration"
"The territories of two married people interpenetrate a lot"

auth_sentence.content: The terror of Global Warming continues to permeate the planet!

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The terror of Global Warming continues to permeate the planet!

auth_sentence.res_content: Farther west, community regeneration continues to permeate development thinking.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Farther west, community regeneration continues to permeate development thinking.

auth_sentence.content: There were no windows; the light seemed to permeate the walls.
auth_sentence.res_content: There were no windows; the light seemed to permeate the walls.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There were no windows; the light seemed to permeate the walls.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"贯穿,自始至终;全部"; 2. 表示"假,坏"

stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+enn年+ial的→全年的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+man拿住+ent……的→永久拿住→永恒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+nic毒+ious……的→有毒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+plex重叠+ed……的→重叠在一起→困惑的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了→透视的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
per假,坏+funct作用+ory……的→没起好作用→草率的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+cuss摇动,敲打+ion表名词→一直敲打
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+oxide氧化物→贯穿的氧化物→过氧化物
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱
per假,坏+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
per假,坏+jur发誓+y状态→假发誓;参考:jury陪审团
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+forate打孔→打孔穿过→打洞
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+fuse流→流遍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弥漫,遍布,散布;渗入,渗透
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+me走+ate表动词→走过去→渗透过去
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+sist站→站到最后→坚持
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+suade劝→一直劝→劝说
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+use利用→[读书的时候]全部利用→细读
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vade走→走遍,遍及
per假,坏+petr石+ate表动词→像石头一样顽固的做坏事→专横,做坏事
per假,坏+vert转→转向坏→堕落

means.word_mean: 弥漫, 遍布, 散布,渗透,扩散

sentences.en: The banquet was permeated with an atmosphere of friendship.
sentences.cn: 宴会洋溢着友好的气氛。

jushi.english: The odor of frying onions permeated the air.
jushi.chinese: 空气中弥漫着炒洋葱的气味。

jushi.english: The rain permeated the old tent.
